title: Their Love Is Too Much For Reality Tv!
alternative_title: Kono Koi wa Kageki Sugite Housou Dekimasen ; この恋は過激すぎて放送できません
status: Kono Koi wa Kageki Sugite Housou Dekimasen ; この恋は過激すぎて放送できません
description:
Description :
        "It's supposed to be a reality show with only gay participants...!?" A love story of a tsundere being thrown off balance by a big, sweet, and clueless guy they have to live with!" The young actor Makoto, receives an offer to appear on a reality show observing male-male relationships, but he isn't motivated for the project. However, the presence of Seiji, a gym trainer and one of the participants, throws Makoto off his game. One night, while forced to share a room, Makoto catches Seiji's embarrassed gaze as he struggles to hide his growing arousal. Under the pretense of "helping," Makoto teases Seiji's, leaving him moaning and on the brink of tears of pleasure. This... can't be broadcast!
